::Vamprah::

Vamprah was deeply sleep, when DevilDuel opened th cr's door. Her 
body agited quikly as if his precence was a menace but soon her 
breathing was getting calmyly and her movements relaxed, as if she 
were in a safe place. The expresion of her face was almost pacefuly 
and her movement were slow.

She seemed that she was taking a nap. Anyone could guess the fierce 
fighting that minutes before she had been.

Vamprah moved slowly as if she tried to find a confortable position 
to sleep.

(NOte to Airshdow: If it's possible sleep confotable in that place)

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> Gotta go to sleep. Cya tomorrow everyone!
> 
> ::DevilDuer::
> 
> The question takes DevilDuer by surprize, the bot's eyes widening 
for 
> a sec before he answers. "Nah, I'm always like this."
> 
> He finishes on her other arm, tossing the laser cutter back on the 
> table.
> 
> "There," he says, looking to the next room at the CR chambers, "Ya 
> might wanna take a CR break. I'm gonna check on that femm."
> 
> He exits the room, walking up to Vamprah's pod and looking at her.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> > 
> > Diamond::
> > 
> > She held out her other arm. "Yes please." She sighed and held out 
> her 
> > other arm for him. "You know, if you've ever been on the 
receiveing 
> > end of a mind controllong devise, you'd have the same view as I."
> > 
> > She remembered what it was like to see herself doing things and 
not 
> > being the one in control of her own body.  She hated mind 
> > controllers. With all her spark she hated them.  She stared at 
her 
> > wrists as he worked on her. She was seeing herself kill the High 
> > Predacon council leader, SythWave. She smiled at seeing his mech 
> > fluid on her blade. She remembered when she found out that it was 
> him 
> > doing the controlling over her. She suddenly snapped back into 
> > reality as she felt sharp pain in her arm as he worked.
> > 
> > She smiled, "You always this charming, or just charming a snake?"
